img_summary: The image shows a blue, double-gourd-shaped ceramic container with a narrow neck and a wide body. The top of the container is sealed with a piece of brown paper or cloth, which is gathered and tied at the neck, resembling a stopper or lid. The container is placed against a dark background, highlighting its glossy surface and vibrant color.
